1.title: Rio Soto Launches New Website: 80 Years of Flavor, Now Just a Click Away
1.excerpt: Today we take an important step toward the future without forgetting our roots: we're launching our new website!
1.content:
For over 80 years, Rio Soto has been part of the lives of Salvadoran families. Generation after generation, our ice cream and popsicles have been present in the freshest and happiest moments of your daily life. Today we take an important step toward the future without forgetting our roots, and we want to share it with you: we're launching our new website!

## A new window to our world

We know that times change, and we want to be closer to you than ever. That's why we created a modern digital space where you can:

- **Explore all our products and flavors:** From the classics that have been with you since childhood to the new creations we're preparing for you.
- **Order online:** Now you can order your favorite ice cream and popsicles without leaving home. Easier, faster, fresher.
- **Discover our story:** 80 years is a lot of ground to cover. We invite you to discover how a Salvadoran family turned their passion into the flavor that unites us all.
- **Career opportunities:** Want to be part of the Rio Soto family? In our careers section you can see available positions and apply directly.

## What else is coming?

This is just the beginning. Very soon we'll be launching a recipes section where you'll discover creative and delicious ways to enjoy our products. Because a Rio Soto ice cream can be so much more than just ice cream.

And of course, this blog will be a space to keep you up to date with everything happening at Rio Soto: new flavors, events, promotions, and more.

## Thank you for being part of our story

Every ice cream, every popsicle, every fresh smile carries 80 years of family dedication. This website is our way of saying thank you and continuing to grow alongside you.

We invite you to explore the new site and share it with your people. Because in the end, that's what we do best: create the flavor that unites us.

---

*Rio Soto — The flavor that unites us.*

2.title: RioSoto Invests in the Future: World-Class Machinery to Keep Refreshing Central America
2.excerpt: We've made a significant investment in state-of-the-art Tetra Pak machinery to keep refreshing Central America.
2.content:
At RioSoto, we don't stay in the past. With 80 years of history, we know that to continue being the flavor that unites us, we need to look ahead. That's why today we proudly share great news: we've made a significant investment in state-of-the-art machinery from Tetra Pak, the Swedish-origin world leader in processing and packaging technology.

## What does this mean for you?

Very simple: more quality, more freshness, and more product so you never run out of your favorite ice cream or popsicle. With this world-class technology we can:

- **Guarantee the best quality in every product** thanks to more precise and modern controls throughout the entire production process.
- **Increase our production capacity** to reach more Central American families, in more places and with greater speed.
- **Maintain the highest international standards,** because you deserve a product made with the best.

## A bet on Central America

This investment isn't just in machinery — it's a bet on the region. It means more jobs, more growth, and the commitment of a family company that from El Salvador continues reinvesting in its people and expanding to Honduras, Guatemala, and all of Central America. While many look elsewhere, we keep betting on our region.

We've spent 80 years preparing every ice cream and every popsicle with dedication. Now, with Tetra Pak technology backing us, we assure you that the next 80 years are going to be even fresher.

Thank you for continuing to choose us. This is just the beginning.

---

*RioSoto — The flavor that unites us.*

about.headerDescription: Since 1946, RioSoto has been synonymous with ice cream in Central America.
about.storyP1: In 1946, a Salvadoran family decided to do something simple but important: create the best ice cream possible. Not the cheapest. Not the best-selling. The best.
about.storyP2: That was 80 years ago. And here we are, still doing the same thing.
about.storyP3: Today, RioSoto is more than a brand. It's a memory. It's the taste of your childhood. It's the ice cream your grandmother used to buy. It's what you ask for when you want something special. It's Central America in a spoon.
